name: The Hatchling (tommysays)
description:
You've found a mysterious egg in the forest! Protect it from monsters, and keep up the flames around it for 5 nights to hatch it.

After each night, you have a chance to spend the day upgrading yourself or the fire.

WASD (or left stick on controller) to move.

CommandKeyboardControllerMelee AttackJA
Ranged AttackIBHeal Fire (must be near fire)OXBuff self (must be near fire)PY

Code, art, and music created by Tommy Lee and Brian Volsky.
